inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: karyotype study revealed 45X and confirmed the diagnosis of Turner syndrome

inclusion.criterion: care with dilatations or by surgery since 1995
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: having started dilatations or having had surgery since at least one year
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: treats with GH since 6 months ago

exclusion.criterion: serious chronic disease interfering with analysis to be performed in this project
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: TSH was 3 and FBS was 75 in the latest lab study

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, short stature, delayed puberty, developmental delay, obesity, and mental retardation. She is being treated with GH.
